channel.title: Slayer bug
channel.description: Hello, there is a problem with the slayer in my server, when i get a task first off even tho im perhaps 90+ slayer i still get low monsters all the time (rock crabs etc), after that when i have finished my task it doesn't come up as if i have finished it, the count goes like this 20 rock crabs left and then when theres like 2 crabs left it goes to 2 crabs left then 1 then 0 then -1 crab left, basically the task won't finish and players can't get the task complete bonus and pts ofc if anyone knows how to fix it please comment or add me on skype gmaulcombo

item.title: Slayer bug
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Well, how is your slayer being handled, when is the player supposed to get the bonus points?

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer bug
item.dc:creator: @JavaX JavaX
item.description:
@JavaX wrote:

It doesn’t sound like you’re checking if they have completed the task before you total how many monsters left you have to kill. I’d go in and look for that.

As for the other issue, I’m sure you could implement certain level brackets;

if (slayerLevel < 20) { weakTask(); } else if (slayerLevel >= 20 && slayerLevel < 50) { mediumTask(); }
and so on…

Read full topic

item.title: Slayer bug
item.dc:creator: @Coltex Coltex
item.description:
@Coltex wrote:

Hello, there is a problem with the slayer in my server, when i get a task first off even tho im perhaps 90+ slayer i still get low monsters all the time (rock crabs etc), after that when i have finished my task it doesn’t come up as if i have finished it, the count goes like this 20 rock crabs left and then when theres like 2 crabs left it goes to 2 crabs left then 1 then 0 then -1 crab left, basically the task won’t finish and players can’t get the task complete bonus and pts ofc if anyone knows how to fix it please comment or add me on skype gmaulcombo
